additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: MINI MENTOS RAINBOW. Chewy fruit flavoured confectionery. Ingredients: sugar, glucose syrup, hydrogenated vegetable oil (coconut), acidity regulator (citric acid), starch, thickeners (gum arabic, gellan gum), flavourings, glazing agents (carnauba wax, beeswax), emulsifier (sucrose esters of fatty acids), colours (anthocyanins, sodium copper chlorophyllin, carotenes, curcumin, beet red). MINI MENTOS STRAWBERRY MIX. Assorted chewy confectionery with different strawberry flavours. Ingredients: Ingredients: sugar, glucose syrup, acidity regulators (citric acid, malic acid), hydrogenated vegetable oil (coconut), starch, thickeners (gum arabic, gellan gum), flavourings, glazing agents (carnauba wax, beeswax), emulsifier (sucrose esters of fatty acids), colour (beet red). MINI MENTOS CANDY CANE. Chewy vanilla-mint flavoured confectionery.Ingredients: sugar, glucose syrup, hydrogenated vegetable oil (coconut), flavourings, starch, thickeners (gum arabic, gellan gum), emulsifier (sucrose esters of fatty acids), glazing agents (carnauba wax, beeswax).MINI CHUPA CHUPS THE BEST OF. Lollipops, assorted flavours. Ingredients: sugar, glucose syrup, mix fruit puree (apple, cherry, raspberry, pineapple, lime, lemon, strawberry, peach, banana, orange, blueberry, blackberry, mango, watermelon, kiwi) (1.8%), acidity regulators (lactic acid, malic acid, citric acid), flavourings, colours (caramel IV, paprika oleoresins, beet red). May contain milk.

additionalProperty.name: Contains
additionalProperty.value: Mini Mentos products contain beeswax/Chupa Chups contain milk

description: Chupa Chups Mix Of Minis Stocking
